DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Donor Hematopoietic Cell Collection Outcome Blood Transfusion Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes if the tissue donor receive blood transfusions as a result of the hematopoietic cell collection.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tissue Donor Hematopoietic Cell Collection Outcome Blood Transfusion
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)_The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place._The result of an action._The introduction of whole blood or blood component directly into the blood stream. (Dorland, 27th ed).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Concepts.definition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Property.preferredName: Hematopoietic Stem Cell Collection Outcome Blood Transfusion
Property.preferredDefinition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.):The act of gathering something together.:Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.:The administration of blood or blood products into a blood vessel.

Concepts.definition: Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.)
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.
The injection of whole blood or a blood component directly into the bloodstream.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The infusion of components of blood or whole blood into the bloodstream. The blood may be donated from another person, or it may have been taken from the person earlier and stored until needed._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

The injection of whole blood or a blood component directly into the bloodstream.
